title: Glasgow
name: Glasgow Science Centre
directions: train: Exhibition Centre or subway: Cessnock
hours: Summer: daily 10AM-5PM; Winter: W-F 10AM-3PM, Sa-Su 10AM-5PM, closed M-Tu. Glasgow Tower is closed in winter
price: £10.50 adults, £8.50 children/seniors; add £2.50 for planetarium or IMAX cinema each, £4.95 for the tower
content: Has hundreds of interactive science exhibits for children, an IMAX cinema, and the 125-meter '''Glasgow Tower''', the only tower in the world which can rotate 360 degrees from its base.
